programme.desc: At the turn of the Qing Dynasty, heroes and villains everywhere are in a frenzy.

programme.desc: Four swordsmen band together to battle a demonic force.

programme.title: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: As the deceased soul Ja-hong and his three afterlife guardians prepare for their remaining trials for reincarnation, the guardians soon come face to face with the truth of their tragic time on Earth 1,000 years earlier.

programme.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Three grim reapers escorts a man to the afterlife and will decide his fate based on what he had done when he was alive.

programme.title: Ruslan and Ludmilla
programme.desc: A warrior battles sorcerers, witches and an evil dwarf in order to rescue his princess bride (Natal'ya Petrova).

programme.title: The Prodigal Boxer
programme.desc: A young man avenges his father's murder and overcomes martial-arts inexperience with the help of his wise mother.

programme.title: Avenging Boxer
programme.desc: A youth studies the martial arts in order to avenge his father's death and retrieve a sacred golden plate.

programme.title: Master of the Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A blind man disguises himself as a priest and vows to kill a one-armed boxer with a weapon that can decapitate.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: An ex-member of the Ch'ing emperor's flying-blade force develops a similar weapon to repel attacks on innocent commoners.

programme.title: Quantum Voyage
programme.desc: Mattie Carver experiences auditory and visual hallucinations as she witnesses the collapse of space and time.
